title: Pickup order event
description: An event which occured during the processing of the referenced pickup order.

descriptionMap.de: Eine Ereignis (Status), das während der Abarbeitung eines Abholauftrags aufgetreten ist.

pickupOrderNo.title: pickup order number of the contract partner
pickupOrderNo.description: Unique identification for the pickup order within the transport management system of the contract partner

descriptionMap.de: Eindeutige Bezeichnung für den Abholauftrag im Transport-Management-Systen des Auftrag gebenden Partners

pickupOrderDate.title: Pickup order date
pickupOrderDate.description: The date on which the pickup order was forwarded to the contracted partner.

descriptionMap.de: Datum, an dem der Abholauftrag dem Auftrag nehmenden Partner weitergeleitet wurde.

sender.title: Data Origin
sender.description: The sender of the current record. This usually equals to the ordering party unless the record is a copy that was generated by some other component. In this case the sender can be different from the ordering party

descriptionMap.de: Der Versender des Datensatzes. Dies ist in der Regel der beauftragende Partner. Er kann jedoch abweichen, wenn ein Dritter eine Kopie erzeugt und weiterleitet.

receiver.title: Data Recipient
receiver.description: The intended recipient of the the current record. This usually equals to the contracted party unless the record is intentionally sent to another system.

descriptionMap.de: Der Empfänger des Datensatzes. Dies ist in der Regel der mit der Abholung beauftragte Partner. Er kann jedoch abweichen, wenn der Datensatz gezielt an ein anderes System übertragen werden soll.

networkId.title: Network
networkId.description: The network under which rules the pickup order should be processed

descriptionMap.de: Das Netzwerk, unter dessen Regeln die Sendung abgewickelt werden soll.

networkId.title: Name of the network
networkId.description: The name of the network. This is often identical to the name of the code list. Since the same code list may however be used outside the network, this field independently allows to specify the network.

descriptionMap.de: Der Name des Netzwerk. Dieser ist in der Regel identisch mit der Code-Liste. Da die Code-Liste des Netzwerks jedoch auch für bilaterale Vereinbarungen genutzt werden kann, kann das Netzwerk als solches unabhängig angegeben werden

codelist.title: Name of the code list used
codelist.description: The name of the code list which specifies how the receiving system should interpret the codes used

descriptionMap.de: Der Name der verwendeten Code-Liste, die angibt, wie ein empfangendes System die Werte zu interpretieren hat

product.title: Name of the product
product.description: The product allows to distingish different processes within one network, effectively sub classing the network.

descriptionMap.de: Das Produkt erlaubt verschiedene Prozesse innerhalb eines Netzwerks weiter zu unterscheiden und ermöglicht somit eine Unterteilung des Netzwerks in verschiedene Bereiche.

orderingParty.title: Ordering party
orderingParty.description: Person or company that ordered the transport of the pickup order.

descriptionMap.de: Person oder Firma, die die Abholung der Ware beauftragt hat.

contractedPartner.title: Contracted partner
contractedPartner.description: The partner which is contracted for processing the pickup order.

descriptionMap.de: Der Partner, der beauftragt ist die Abholung durchzuführen.

shippingPartner.title: Shipping partner
shippingPartner.description: The partner which is sending the consignment to the receiving partner for further delivery.

descriptionMap.de: Der Partner, der die Sendung an den Empfangspartner für die weitere Zustellung sendet.

receivingPartner.title: Receiving partner
receivingPartner.description: The partner which is receiving the goods declared on the manifest from the shipping partner for further delivery.

descriptionMap.de: Der Partner, der die auf dem Bordero aufgelisteten Sendungen für die weitere Zustellung empfängt.

reportingPartner.title: Reporting partner
reportingPartner.description: The partner which is reporting the event.

descriptionMap.de: Der Partner, der das Ereignis meldet.

dataProcessing.title: Data processing
dataProcessing.description: Events occured while validating and processing the data.

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die durch die Überprüfung und Verarbeitung der Daten entstehen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while processing the data. Use (null) to report successful processing of the data

invalidData.title: Wrong data
invalidData.description: The data is incomplete, missing or wrong

invalidPackageType.title: Wrong package type
invalidPackageType.description: Wrong, incomplete or missing package type information

invalidDangerousGoodInformation.title: Invalid Dangerous good information
invalidDangerousGoodInformation.description: Wrong, incomplete or missing information about the dangerous goods

generalProcessingNotification.title: General processing
generalProcessingNotification.description: Events occured while physically processing the pickup order (e.g. moving goods, scanning packages).

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die während der physischen Abholung der Güter entstehen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while processing the pickup. Use (null) to report successful processing of the pickup

incompatible.title: Incompatible
incompatible.description: The pickup is not within the agreed specifications (e.g. to heavy / big / ...)

incomplete.title: Incomplete
incomplete.description: There are some packages missing from this pickup

ultimatelyLost.title: Ultimately lost
ultimatelyLost.description: Pickup order is utimately lost and will no longer be searched for

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while planning the pickup. Use (null) to report successful planning of the pickup

titleMap.de: in Abholung / in Anfahrt zum Kunden bzw. Versender

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while starting the pickup. Use (null) to report successful starting of the pickup

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while arrival at the pickup location. Use (null) to report successful arrival.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while starting the loading process. Use (null) to report successful starting the loading process.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while completing the loading process. Use (null) to report successful completion of the loading process.

pickupAttemptFailed.title: Pickup attempt failed
pickupAttemptFailed.description: Events indicating a failed pickup attempt

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die einen gescheiterten Abholversuch anzeigen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that caused the pickup to be fail

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die eine erfolgreiche Abholung anzeigen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while pickup the pickup order. Use (null) to report successful pickup.

unloading.title: Unloading
unloading.description: Events occured while unloading the pickup order at the plant of the shipping partner.

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die während der Entladung auf der Halle des Versandpartners entstehen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while unloading the pickup order. Use (null) to report successful unloading the pickup order

damaged.title: Damaged
damaged.description: The consignment was damaged on arrival

forwarding.title: Forwarding
forwarding.description: Events occured while forwarding the pickup order to the receiving partner.

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die während der Weiterverladung auf der Halle des Versandpartners in Richtung Empfangspartner entstehen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while forwarding the pickup order. Use (null) to report successful forwarding the pickup order

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.description: Events indicating the cancellation of the pickup order

descriptionMap.de: Ereignisse, die die Stornierung des Abholauftrags betreffen.

eventDateTime.title: Event date/time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occured
